exclusion: To exclude this device from a Z-Wave network, select the command on your Z-Wave controller for exclusion (Uninstall, Remove Device, Remove Node, Exclude Device, etc.). Then press the device switch one time to exclude it from the network. The LED will start blinking.
inclusion:
1. This product may be added to a new or existing Z-Wave network. A Cooper Wiring Devices Z-Wave device has a blue LED, which will blink when the device is not included in a Z-Wave network. The LED stops blinking when the device is in a network.
  2. To include this device in a Z-Wave network, select the command on your Z Wave controller for inclusion (Install, Add Device, Add Node, Include Device, etc.). Then press the device switch one time to include it in the network. The LED will stop blinking.
label: RF9540-N
overview:
OPERATION INSTRUCTIONS

  • Press once to turn lights ON at previously selected level.
  • Press again to turn lights OFF.
  • When lights are OFF, press and hold for 2 seconds for full brightness.
  • When lights are ON, press and hold for 2 seconds until the blue LED blinks. After the preset delay, the lights will begin fading to OFF (up to 4 minutes).
  • Amber ON/OFF LED indicates that dimmer is turned on.

category.label: Wall Switch
category.description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

parameters.label: Delayed OFF time
parameters.description: time in seconds to delay OFF
parameters.overview: The amount of time in seconds the switch will delay when trigger the delayed off feature

parameters.label: Panic ON time
parameters.description: Time in seconds for panic mode ON
parameters.overview: The amount of time in seconds the switch will turn on for when panic mode is triggered

parameters.label: Panic OFF time
parameters.description: time in seconds for OFF in panic mode
parameters.overview: The amount of time in seconds the switch will turn off for when panic mode is triggered

parameters.label: Basic Set Value
parameters.description: Send value to  association group on trigger
parameters.overview: Setting this to anything other than 0 will cause the value to be transmitted to devices in the association group when the switch is triggered. A setting other than 0 will likely result in undesired operation

parameters.label: Power Up State
parameters.description: Power Up State of the switch

parameters.label: Panic mode enable
parameters.description: Enables this switch to participate in panic mode

parameters.label: Dimmer Ramp Time
parameters.description: Time in seconds to reach desired level
parameters.overview: The amount of time in seconds the switch will take to reach the desired dim level

parameters.label: Kickstart / Rapid Start
parameters.description: Turn on or off rapid start feature
parameters.overview: Ensures that LED / CFL bulbs turn on when the preset dim level is low.  Enabling this feature may cause the lights brightness to momentarily be bright when the switch is turned on before reducing in brightness to desired level

parameters.label: Minimum Dimmer Level
parameters.description: The minimum dim level the switch will allow

parameters.label: Maximum Dimmer Level
parameters.description: The maximum dim level the switch will allow
